resources.string:
Except the Heaven had come so near — 
 So seemed to choose My Door — 
 The Distance would not haunt me so —
 I had not hoped — before —
 
 But just to hear the Grace depart —
 I never thought to see —
 Afflicts me with a Double loss —
 Tis lost — and lost to me —

Dear guest, 
 
 I hope you've enjoyed using this app, my name is Ali and I am a Junior Android Dev. 
 
 The purpose of this app was to learn AWS Lambdas, additionally DynamoDB, API Gateway and Cognito. 
 
 This app feeds off from Lambdas which in turn feed off from https://poetrydb.org/ 
 
 Feel free to SignUp and create a favourites list of your own, you will get the confirmation code via email
>> Random - swipe down to refresh, click heart icon to save to favourites list in DynamoDB
>> Favourites - can view your list of favourite poems, can click to view it
>> Search - can search by titles, will initiate 3 seconds after you\'ve stopped typing
